wikipedia_page.main:
John George Graham Brock (15 December 1915 – 1976) was an English footballer who played as a Goalkeeper for Swindon Town.
Turned out for Bristol University before joining Forest Green Rovers in 1935 he was then soon trailing before eventually joining Swindon Town who paid 1 Guinea to cover his services He later returned to Forest Green Rovers shortly before World War II and later played for Gloucester City.

response: *John Brock (baseball) (1896-1951), American Major League Baseball catcher
